alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 07 at 3:31PM EDT until October 07 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...less than 1 foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.1 to 4.0 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 11 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures along the most vulnerable shoreline roads expected. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chappaquiddick Point MLLW Categories - Minor 4.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.2 ft, Moderate 4.2 ft, Major 5.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/07 PM 3.7/ 4.2 2.8/ 3.4 1.5/ 2.0 4 None 08/08 AM 2.6/ 3.1 1.8/ 2.2 0.8/ 1.3 4-5 None 08/08 PM 2.6/ 3.1 1.8/ 2.2 0.4/ 0.9 4 None 09/09 AM 2.0/ 2.5 1.2/ 1.7 0.2/ 0.7 1-3 None Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/07 PM 2.7/ 3.2 0.8/ 1.3 1.4/ 1.9 3 None 08/07 AM 2.0/ 2.5 0.0/ 0.5 0.7/ 1.1 4 None 08/08 PM 1.8/ 2.2 -0.2/ 0.2 0.4/ 0.9 3 None 09/09 AM 1.5/ 2.0 -0.6/-0.1 0.2/ 0.7 2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
